snippet: A former teammate says Jets quarterback Mark Sanchez doesn't have what it takes to be a  leader, and an Indianapolis reporter says Bill Polian was a football master who made people miserable.
abstract: A former teammate says Jets quarterback Mark Sanchez doesn't have what it takes to be a  leader, and an Indianapolis reporter says Bill Polian was a football master who made people miserable.

headline.main: Criticism of Mark Sanchez and Bill Polian
